entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 09:52 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
